General.Name: Jess-Link Products Co Ltd
General.Description: Jess-link Products Co., Ltd. provides various electronic products in Taiwan and internationally. The company operates through Electronic Products Components Manufacturing, Electronic Peripheral Sales, and Others segments. It offers connectors, such as wire to board and to wire connectors, EMI cages, high-speed connectors, I/O connectors, and magnetic and modular jacks and plugs; Cable Assemblies, including direct attach cables, high speed cable and fiber optic assemblies, FFC jumpers, ethernet LAN cables, I/O cable assemblies, industrial cables, and high power and current wire harness; transceivers; active optical cables; and flexible flat, bulk flat, high speed, high temperature, and high power flat cables. The company also provides robot and controller, machine vision and surveillance, PLC, and IPC solutions; IoT products consisting of IoT modules, homekit and smart home products, and NBIoT devices; wireless chargers; remote controllers; programmable IoT buttons, IoT scanners, streaming music players, wireless power, and MFi series products; and flexible feeding systems. In addition, it offers accessories, such as lightning hubs/dongles, type-c hubs/ dongles, convertors/adpators, fast chargers, and car chargers; automotive products, energy storage systems, and green energy products; customized cable assembly services; and proximity/photoelectric sensors, and wire-saving terminal block product series. Further, the company engages in wholesale and trade of electronic materials; distribution and trade of communication and network apparatus; design of wireless communication equipment and apparatus; sales of integrated circuit sockets and computer connectors; and manufacturing and sales of connectors, and cable assemblies and cables. Its products are used in smart connection, datacenter/networking/telecommunication, Internet of Things (IoT), and new energy and vehicle industries. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 176, Jian 1st Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
